captions.text:
Hello~! [HENRY] This is Henry
[CHAN YEOL] And I'm Chan Yeol of EXO

[HENRY] It has been a really long time, everyone!
I missed you all a lot. Really.

And Chan Yeol! /[CHAN YEOL] Yes!
[HENRY] I missed you a lot/ [CHAN YEOL] Me too!

[HENRY] Well, when I was performing 'TRAP', 
I have showed you various version of it
And now I will be coming back with '1-4-3 (I Love You)' so soon,
But before then, AWWW~~! With Chan Yeol of EXO, let me perform some part of the acoustic version of '1-4-3 (I Love You)' for you.
[CHAN YEOL] Yup! I feel so happy to perform with Henry, and I will try my best so please, show us your love and support

Well then, shall we start? / [HENRY] Yes!
Please listen carefully!!

title: Henry 헨리_'1-4-3 (I Love You)'_Acoustic Version with Chan Yeol of EXO
